## Installing SWMPr

### Option 1

From the R Console prompt, run the following commands to install from CRAN and load. 

```{r eval = FALSE}
install.packages('SWMPr')
library(SWMPr)
```

### Option 2

1) Download the source file: [v2.1.7.9000.tar.gz](https://github.com/fawda123/SWMPr/archive/v2.1.7.9000.tar.gz)

2) Install the file using the full file path

```{r eval = F}
# change as needed
path_to_file <- 'C:/Users/mbeck/Desktop/SWMPr-v2.1.7.9000.tar.gz'

# install, load
install.packages(path_to_file, repos = NULL, type="source")
library(SWMPr)
```
